review: I love this thing. I hooked this up in the same room as my router so I can't speak to it's uses throughout the house. But, I LOVE THIS THING. It has given me streaming to a tv I meticulously installed without wires dangling.  I ordered the small wires that connect to the usb on the tv but they were unnecessary. The roku stick comes with a usb to charger cord that certainly would have sufficed. Unfortunately my usb on the tv was not enough juice to run the roku stick anyway so I used the charging block in the same outlet the tv was hook up to with the addition of an outlet splitter. I now have hi def streaming to this tv and not even once has the remote not worked properly even though the stick is behind the tv. Rarely does a product actually do what it claims, this one does. Best money I have spent in quite some time.
